Company: Zivro - A Product of Kapnovate Technologies Pvt Ltd.
Job Description:
Building rich responsive UI for our Web/ Mobile template libraries as well as App and making engaging interfaces. Were a hard working team that is dedicated to thrilling our customers with beautiful UI.
